content.html:
Table of Contents
  • 11:31AM - Observations of using Hyperbole for blogging

11:31AM - Observations of using Hyperbole for blogging

Using GNU Hyperbole I’ve created global buttons to simply my workflow for blogging. So far I have created global buttons that:

  • Capture a blog post
  • Opens the blog.org file
  • Goes to my Now file
  • Clock-In / Out view clocked history of a task or item I was working on using counsel-org-clock
  • Takes my learning notes and creates a learning post from them
  • Captures my journal entries and allows me to export them
